import React from 'react'; function Returns() { return (

Returns & Exchanges

Easy returns and exchanges for your peace of mind

Our Return Policy

We want you to be completely satisfied with your SkyCart purchase. If you're not happy with your order, we offer easy returns and exchanges within 30 days of delivery.

📅 30-Day Window

Return or exchange items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange.

📦 Free Return Shipping

We provide prepaid return labels for all eligible returns within the US.

💳 Quick Refunds

Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days once we receive your return.

What Can Be Returned

✅ Eligible for Return

  • Clothing and accessories
  • Electronics in original packaging
  • Home and garden items
  • Books and media
  • Toys and games
  • Unopened beauty products

❌ Not Eligible for Return

  • Personalized or custom items
  • Perishable goods
  • Digital downloads
  • Gift cards
  • Opened cosmetics or personal care items
  • Items damaged by misuse

How to Return an Item

1

Start Your Return

Visit your account and select "Return Items" from your order history, or contact customer service.

2

Print Return Label

We'll email you a prepaid return shipping label. Print it and attach to your package.

3

Package Your Items

Place items in original packaging when possible. Include all accessories and documentation.

4

Ship It Back

Drop off at any authorized shipping location or schedule a pickup.

5

Get Your Refund

Once we receive and process your return, your refund will be issued in 3-5 business days.

Exchanges

Need a different size or color? We offer free exchanges on most items. Simply return the original item and place a new order for the item you want.

Size Exchanges

Perfect for clothing, shoes, and accessories. Get the right fit every time.

Color Exchanges

Changed your mind about the color? Exchange for any available color option.

Product Exchanges

Want a completely different item? Return for a refund and place a new order.

International Returns

International customers can return items, but return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility. We recommend using a trackable shipping service.

Important Notes:

  • Customer pays return shipping costs
  • Items must be returned within 30 days
  • Customs forms may be required
  • Refunds exclude original shipping charges

Damaged or Defective Items

Received a damaged or defective item? We'll make it right immediately. Contact us within 7 days of delivery for the fastest resolution.

What We Need:

  • Photos of the damaged item
  • Your order number
  • Description of the issue

What We'll Do:

  • Immediate replacement or full refund
  • Prepaid return label for damaged item
  • No questions asked

Need Help?

Questions about returns or exchanges? Our customer service team is here to help.

📞 Phone Support

1-800-SKYSHOP (1-800-759-7467)

Monday-Friday: 8 AM - 8 PM EST

💬 Live Chat

Available 24/7 on our website

Get instant help from our team

✉️ Email Support

returns@skycart.com

Response within 24 hours

); } export default Returns;
